findings.title: Highly permissive role
findings.description: The owner can disable the pool, set ratez and base tier, change the pool's start and end date, pause and unpause token buying functions, leading to token manipulation.
findings.function: pause, pausePool, buyTokensETH, buyTokensQuoteAsset, redeemTokens, disablePool, setStartDate, setEndDate, setRate, setBaseTier

findings.title: Check-Effect Interaction Pattern Violation
findings.description: The code does not follow the Check-Effect-Interaction pattern if it performs any external call.
